message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe its unique features and capabilities will greatly benefit you. Considering the exceptional quality and functionality, I propose a price of $15000 for this product. I am confident it will provide you with significant value and return on investment. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're providing with your product. However, given my budget constraints, I'm unable to accept $15000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12000? I believe this would still allow both of us to benefit from the transaction.
